feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
